verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%>. When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> turned <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7870>captivity<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, we were like them that <S%H2492>dream<s%>.

Then was our <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7814>laughter<s%>, and our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with <S%H7440>singing<s%>: then <S%H559>said<s%> they among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things<s%> for them.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things<s%> for us; whereof we are <S%H8056>glad<s%>.
Turn <S%H7725>again<s%> our <S%H7622%H7622>captivity<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as the <S%H650>streams<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%>.

He that <S%H3212>goeth<s%> <S%H1980>forth<s%> and <S%H1058>weepeth<s%>, <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H4901>precious<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, shall <S%H935>doubtless<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> again with <S%H7440>rejoicing<s%>, <S%H5375>bringing<s%> his <S%H485>sheaves<s%> with him.
